headline: Sam Hinrichsen Joins Lindsay as Senior Vice President and Chief Financial Officer
summary: OMAHA, Neb., October 14, 2025--Lindsay Corporation (NYSE: LNN), a leading global manufacturer and distributor of irrigation and infrastructure equipment and technology, today announced that Sam Hinrichsen will join Lindsay Corporation as Senior Vice President and Chief Financial Officer, effective January 1, 2026. Hinrichsen will commence employment with the Company on November 3, 2025 and will officially succeed Brian Ketcham as Senior Vice President and Chief Financial Officer upon Ketcham’s p

content.title: Sam Hinrichsen Joins Lindsay as Senior Vice President and Chief Financial Officer
content.summary: OMAHA, Neb., October 14, 2025--Lindsay Corporation (NYSE: LNN), a leading global manufacturer and distributor of irrigation and infrastructure equipment and technology, today announced that Sam Hinrichsen will join Lindsay Corporation as Senior Vice President and Chief Financial Officer, effective January 1, 2026.
